com.bouyguesenergiesservices.opcuafctaddon.gateway

Class GetOPCGatewayFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bouyguesenergiesservices.opcuafctaddon.GetOPCScriptFunctions
      • com.bouyguesenergiesservices.opcuafctaddon.gateway.GetOPCGatewayFunctions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GetOPCRPC

    public class GetOPCGatewayFunctions
extends GetOPCScriptFunctions
    Created by regis on 19/10/2016. Gateway implementation of GetOPCScriptFunctions. The actual code to retrieve remote OPC function is in the passed rpc object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  GetOPCGatewayFunctions.SubscriptionConfig

      private class  GetOPCGatewayFunctions.TimeoutSubscriptionManager
      The manager of the Subscription Each 30 seconds, it check if a call readValueSubscribe.

      • readValues

        public java.util.List<com.inductiveautomation.ignition.common.model.values.QualifiedValue> readValues(java.lang.String opcServer,
                                                                                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> lstItemPath)
        Equivalent to the system.opc.readValue in the local gateway to Local.(Lecture OPC Basic Local)
        Parameters:
        opcServer - The name of the OPC server connection in which the items reside.
        lstItemPath - A list of strings, each representing an item path, or address to read from.
        Returns:
        QualifiedValue[] A sequence of objects, one for each address specified, in order. Each object will contains the value, quality, and timestamp returned from the OPC server for the corresponding address.

      • subscribe

        public java.lang.String subscribe(java.lang.String opcServer,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> lstItemPath,
                                  int rate)
        Declare an OPC Subscription (locally ) with lstItemPath (only integer type). Call cyclically the readSubscribeValues to refresh all values.
        Parameters:
        opcServer - The name of the OPC server connection in which the items reside.
        lstItemPath - A list of strings, each representing an item path, or address to read from.
        rate - Frequency of the subscription
        Returns:
        String UID of the subscription declare

      • isSubscribe

        public boolean isSubscribe(java.lang.String subscriptionName)
        Check if the specify Subscription Name is currently exist in the local gateway.
        Parameters:
        subscriptionName - UID of the subscription research
        Returns:
        boolean True, if the subscription is currently declare and managed else False.

      • readSubscribeValues

        public java.util.List<com.inductiveautomation.ignition.common.model.values.QualifiedValue> readSubscribeValues(java.lang.String subscriptionName)
        Get all last OPC values states of lstItemPath subscribe before subscriptionName in the local gateway . If there is no change until the previous calling, None is return. If a subscription isn't read with "readSubscribeValues" function 30 seconds later, it is automatically unsubscribe (Timeout).
        Parameters:
        subscriptionName - UID of the subscription
        Returns:
        QualifiedValue[] A sequence of ALL objects (even unchanged object), one for each address specified, in order. Each object will contains the value, quality, and timestamp returned from the OPC server for the corresponding address.

      • unsubscribe

        public boolean unsubscribe(java.lang.String subscriptionName)
        This function close an active subscription declare locally.
        Parameters:
        subscriptionName - UID of the subscription
        Returns:
        boolean True if the subscription exist and close.

      • unsubscribeAll

        public void unsubscribeAll()
        Closed all active Subscription on this local Gateway

      • shutdownGatewayScriptModule

        public void shutdownGatewayScriptModule()
        This function unsubscribe all active Subscription and unregister allocate resources

      • callGANService

        private GetOPCService callGANService(java.lang.String remoteServer)
        Function that call a GAN service type 'GetOPCService' Interface available on any Gateway
        Parameters:
        remoteServer - Name of the remote Gateway Server
        Returns:
        GetOPCService an interface available on the remoteServer
